replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content:
/gamerule announceAdvancements false

或者 Server.properties 中设置 announce-player-achievements 为 false

replies.txt_content: /gamerule announceAdvancements false这个,但是关掉之后玩家就不能体验乐趣了(*Φ皿Φ*)
